resources.string: This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
The date on the device appears to be incorrect. Please check the date on the device.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
PhotoSniper uses Google Play Services to get you location. We couldn\'t connect. Would you like to try again?
Did you know? We’re the friendliest folks the world has ever known (science fact).
Do you want to disconnect this slave device?
Flick the switch to \'on\' to become visible to others running PhotoSniper Mobile on your Wi-Fi network. When they connect to your device, you can trigger their cameras wirelessly.
Get the right kit for the job
PhotoSniper uses Google Play Location services to get location information, you cannot use distance lapse without a valid Google play account or Google Play App installed.
Got it? Awesome. Enough babble already.
Got that? Great! Now let’s connect your camera...
PhotoSniper distance lapse works best when GPS is enabled on your device. Would you like to enable GPS now?
Your HDR settings have generated invalid results. Try increasing your middle exposure or decreasing the number of exposures and EV step.
If you get stuck, if you have any ideas you want to share or you just fancy a chat, remember you can get hold of us at night and day.

To install the PhotoSniper Pebble app on your watch select \'Install Pebble App\' in the Action menu. In Pebble mode we\'re using a Pebble smartwatch as a trigger. Connect to a Pebble, and wait for the Pebble to trigger this camera. How cool is that? Press the red button to start listening
In PhotoSniper, you’ll find a fine selection of tasty triggering modes. Experiment to your heart’s content and click your creative photography into high gear!

In Wi-Fi slave mode we\'re using another PhotoSniper Mobile device as a trigger. Connect to the Master device, and wait for the other device to trigger this camera. How cool is that? Press the red button to start searching
Check location services and try again.
Send us an email and we’ll try make things better.
Oh no! Would you like some support?

Of course, given that this is a Beta, there may be the odd quirk here and there. If you’d like to help us make the Android app better, please report any bugs and make any suggestions you have on our dedicated Android forum (http://tri.gg/betaforum)\n
Oh, hi there! Pleased to meet you.
Touch the button to open the shutter on your camera. To end your exposure just let go
Touch the button to open the shutter on your camera. When you’re done, touch it again to end your exposure. Easy!
Press to open the shutter and press again to close the shutter
Hold the button down, wait for the perfect moment, then just let go!
Release button to take a picture
Remember that the app currently only triggers a shot so keep your camera ready configured at your preferences ;-)
Set a time, tap the red button, and get in position!
Tap the big red button to make the magic happen
So you want to trigger your camera? Good news! You’ve just turned your smartphone or tablet into the best camera triggering device that money can buy. Congratulations on your wise choice.
Tap the button to take a picture
Set up a time interval for each shot of your timelapse
Your timelapse interval is smaller than your pulse length!
Select your favourite shutter speed. Press the button. Relax - the exposure ends when the timer runs down.
To connect the app to your camera, You can either use WiFi Direct connection to running Remote App in your SONY camera or control your camera via BLE (SniperBox needed!!)
How about a high five for our developers?
It will only take two ticks.
Wow! Would you like to review PhotoSniper?
Touch to start, release to stop
Touch to start. Touch to stop
PhotoSniper needs your volume set to maximum

You can access each mode from the menu on the left-hand side on your screen. To open it either swipe from the left side of the screen, or tap the little menu button at the top.
You’ve installed a Beta version of our Android app. Which is pretty awesome, because it puts you in the 1%% sexiest people in the world category.
